doc:
Artie Auerbach https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artie_Auerbach 0 Arthur (Artie) Auerbach (May 17, 1903 – October 3, 1957), was an American comic actor and professional photographer who became famous as "Mr. Kitzel", first on the Al Pearce radio show in 1937 then as a regular on the Jack Benny radio show for 12 years. He also worked with Phil Baker before joining the Jack Benny Show. Arthur ( Artie ) Auerbach ( May_17_,_1903 – October_3_,_1957 ) , was an_American_comic_actor and professional_photographer who became famous as " Mr._Kitzel " , first on the_Al_Pearce_radio_show in 1937_then as a_regular on the_Jack_Benny_radio_show for 12_years . He also worked with Phil_Baker before joining the_Jack_Benny_Show .
